summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6241 for the improvement of 51st Ave. South from Creston Street to Roxbury Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89872, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
